title: Economy Suite
description: The Economy Suite combines four useful inventory and economy tools into one handy package that is easy to use and simple to implement.
longDescription: Video: youtube.com/watch?v=OQfAn0biY90&feature=youtu.be The Economy Suite is a 3-part suite containing the following items; Banking and stashes, Merchants/Vendors and a fully featured Auction House. This system also features a basic inventory to work with and a very easy way to setup any item in your game. Do you require an economic system? Player saved banks or storage? Merchants/Vendors to buy or sell to? Or even just an inventory system? Or a fully featured crafting material storage? Components include: • Auction House interface for easy control • Tooltips for easy viewing what the item is • Easy to add new variables to the tooltips/auction house • Receiving items after you login, when they were done while you were offline • Adding items to the auction house • Removing your items form the auction house • Simplistic mail system for delivery of your items • Support for saving • Support for dedictated server and player server • Stats per item • Easy to understand system to add new variables to the auctions and items • Displaying only the items you enabled in the categories • Searching for items with a search bar • Bidding • Buying • Selling • Viewing your own auctions • Timed auctions (choose between 12-24-36-48h) until auction is dueItemcore which stores all information of all items • Canceling auctions • Stats for every item • Stacking items • Stack selling on auction house • Stack buying on auction house • Picking up items • Very-easy to setup items with datatables • Rarity of items which display with a color • Categories • Setup Shops in minutes • Data-table driven information • Banking for players • Saved on server, also works locally • Per user id banks • Adding items to the bank • Removing items from the bank • Crafting tab for easy overview on crafting materials • Searching in the bank • Searching for auctions • Categorizing auctions • Stashes for loot
technicalDetails: • (21) Blueprints • (16) UMGs • (8) Structs • (4) Enums Intended Platform: Windows, Mac OS Tested Platforms: Windows Setup Tutorial: youtube.com/watch?v=gSMfR_40skg Important/Additional notes: This system works with an ID system, which for a single player game isn't important at all and can be set at 0, for multiplayer this is only a need when you're working with servers that have a dedictated server or are online 24/7 and you want it to work when they logout and log back in.
